TEXT.TITLE: LOWE'S <LOW> TO SELL DURAKON <DRKN> LINER
TEXT.BODY: Durakon Industries Inc said its All Star Liner will be sold as the exclusive pickup truckbed liner in Lowe's Cos Inc's 300 retail home center outlets in the Southeastern U.S. Reuter
